basics.name: Senior Lending Officer - VP Executive Officer
basics.summary: Senior Commercial Lender with 25 years as a leader in the financial industry. Service-oriented with expertise in building a solid customer base. Small Business Development Leader. Effectively grew Commercial Loan balances 5-10% each of the Product Line Expansion on both Residential Mortgage and past five years.

work.name: Regional Community Bank
work.summary: Responsible for the Management and Development of six(6) Commercial Lending Officers whose roles and responsibilities include the development of new business within their assigned areas of responsibilities and portfolios. Achieved an average of $60,000.0 in new commercial lending originations over the last five years . C&I and CREM portfolio active balance growth for the bank to over $150,000.0 representing a 5% year/year growth rate. Responsible for the management and functionality of the banks Residential Mortgage Group including the groups 7 staff members. Responsible for the development and management of the Consumer Loan Manager.
highlights: Effectively grew Commercial Loan balances 5-10% each of the past five years.
Established a robust outbound calling plan for the banks sales force.
Created a CRM platform with the banks BakerHill Commercial Software.
Designed and implemented an Incentive Compensation Plan (ICP) for the sales force.
Implemented new software systems with MortgageBot and DecisionPro.
Active member of local financing agency's Board of Directors (GSBDC and NYBDC)

work.summary: Responsible for the outbound sales and servicing activity of the Commercial Lending and Business Banking activity/function in the Syracuse region. Small business expert for this segment.
